article: Paul Smith enjoys playing sports and his favourite sport is basketball. Five months ago, Paul watched a basketball match on TV and he liked it. Now he plays basketball every day. He has some big nice posters of basketball players _ his bedroom's wall and before he goes to sleep, he often _ magazines about basketball. " There's only one problem for me," says Paul. "I'm too _ .Basketball players are usually tall and I'm not tall enough." _ Paul is a good player. He plays in his school team and they have just won their first match. His favourite basketball _ is Yao Ming. He likes him very much .He has many pictures of _ .Now he wants to take a picture with Yao Ming.
